content.rendered:
Since the start of the COVID-19 pandemic, students seeking a job or internship have had to do so entirely virtually. In February 2021, Handshake surveyed over 1,000 college students across all types of institutions about their sentiments on conducting a virtual job search.

Click to download the infographic, then read more on what Handshake thinks this means for students navigating the virtual job search.

Download Infographic

excerpt.rendered: One year later, students reflect on virtual recruiting
